name: Coin Wars
description:
The goal of the game is to get as much gold coins as possible.

How? You simply have to ether split or steal. Depending on both your and your opponent's choice, you will ether gain or lose gold coins.

What will be your strategy? All split? All steal? A mix? Randomly? The choice is yours!

You will also be able to use your abilities to gain extra gold coins or mitigate your loss.

But wait, there is more! You also have a mine and a mint to generate extra gold coins!

If you lost all your gold coins, there is also a bank. I'm sure they will loan you some gold coins, but be careful not to get into too much debt.
